data.feedback: All 9 user requirements fully covered with correct backend integration. Architecture follows Flutter best practices with clean architecture and feature-based organization. Dependencies are logical. Only minor issue is a file path reference (build.gradle vs build.gradle.kts).
issues: Minor: epic-platform-config references 'android/app/build.gradle' but actual file is 'build.gradle.kts'
suggestions: Update filesToModify in epic-platform-config to use 'android/app/build.gradle.kts'
